message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'll take $60, and you get $40. It's important to settle this quickly because of the inflation.
Alice, your sense of fairness is a little off. Let's split the difference from your offer -  55 for me, 45 for you.  This makes sense considering the inflation will hurt you more.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. Let's just split it 50/50 and call it a day.  Another round and we both lose out.
